Summary: Response not received for DID-F186 In Programming session
[SFLP] Current session Ecu response is not matching with expected response
StakeholderSummary:
In V8 software ECU reset response received two times(before and after reset)this is causing an issue.

Impact:
The session out from one session to another session takes time .

Summary: DOIP taking time to connect after Reset.
StakeholderSummary:
Description:
The doip is taking time to connect back after reset, because of In V8 software ECU reset response received two times(before and after reset)this is causing an issue.

Impact:
The services are related to ECU reset delays the response .
